name: Lost Robot (itch)
description:
A robot appears to have woken up in a empty facility, however the reason behind this is not known. Discover what exactly you are as well as the strange events that appear to have taken place in the past. Find your way around and solve puzzles to build yourself up & open up more rooms in the facility.

This game was made as a University project.

Created by:

Christiaan D. W. van Wyk

Saeed I. Abdellah

Saif A. Zakaria

Satchee Shastree
